page.title: 12OLDER CHILDREN'S HOBBIES
page.content: My hobby is keeping rats and I have 4 of them. They are very clean and intelligent animals. I call one of them Budgie because when I feed her she sits on my finger. The more you handle them the tamer they become. They never bite if they have been hand-reared. { My hobby is collecting scented {rubbers. I have over 50 and nearly all {of them have a fruity smell. My {favourite one is a yellow frog with {green feet. They cost between 10p and {60p from stationery shops. Most of my {rubbers are made in Taiwan and Japan. I have been playing Subbuteo since I was 7. I have 63 teams and a lot of accessories which include terraces, camera men and outside T.V. units, extra goals, cups, to name but a few. Subbuteo is a very interesting game which has been going since 1947.
